abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Metropolitan Opera double bill of Tchaikovsky's Iolanta and Bartok's Bluebeard's Castle.
lead_paragraph: Delayed by a storm, new productions of “Bluebeard’s Castle” and “Iolanta” made their debut at the Metropolitan Opera, with Valery Gergiev conducting.
snippet: Delayed by a storm, new productions of “Bluebeard’s Castle” and “Iolanta” made their debut at the Metropolitan Opera, with Valery Gergiev conducting.

headline.main: A Stage Awash in Tears and Blood
headline.seo: ‘Bluebeard’s Castle’ and ‘Iolanta’ Open at the Met
headline.print_headline: A Stage Awash in Tears and Blood
